article_title: Texas will be site of Terence 'Bud' Crawford’s next fight
article_text:
Thank you for reading and relying on Omaha.com for your news and information. You have now viewed your 30 day allowance of 12 free Omaha.com articles. og.description: World lightweight champion Terence "Bud" Crawford's next bout finally has a home. The unbeaten Omahan verified Sunday that his junior welterweight fight against Thomas Dulorme will take place in Arlington, Texas, on April 18.
og.title: Texas will be site of Terence 'Bud' Crawford’s next fight

article_metadata.description: World lightweight champion Terence "Bud" Crawford's next bout finally has a home. The unbeaten Omahan verified Sunday that his junior welterweight fight against Thomas Dulorme will take place in Arlington, Texas, on April 18.
